sentences.sContent: Eight massive stone pillars supported the roof.
sentences.sCn: 八根巨大的石柱支撑起房顶。

sentences.sContent: Mr Fitzwilliam had been seen as a pillar of the community.
sentences.sCn: 菲茨威廉先生已被视为社区的骨干。

phrases.pCn: ◎(无目的地)从一处到另一处；东奔西跑

remMethod.val: “劈了” → 他一生气把那柱子给劈了 → 柱子

words.tran: 用柱支持；用柱子的形式体现（pillar的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a tall upright round post used as a support for a roof or bridge
